channel.title: stereogram on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in stereogram on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Finished 3D maze
item.description: ##20:26 Monday 03 November 2014 JST## Though it’s not as smooth as I had hoped, I got a maze made with my gradient on https://www.easystereogrambuilder.com/3d-stereogram-maker.aspx. If you can’t solve the stereogram, look at the mask for the maze. I think the stereogram z-dimension curves look a lot steeper than the mask.
